name: FightingGame.py
description:
(Do not move the FightingGameFiles away from FightingGame.py!)

it is fightingGame 1.18.1

i made the first 7 characters. thepromanager made 7 more. sme aothers too.

All classes have 4 attacks +ult

CONTROSL: XCVB UIOP to attack. down arrow for ult. (Idk about controller it works ok)

you can press 1 or 2 for ai and thingw. Also you can change controls in the code or chamge fps if you are noob or pro.

its avery good game.(gg)

disclaimer: Your PC might say that this is a virus. It's not (duh) but if you dont know/trust me you don't need to play the game. Have a nice day!
